game.text: Nintendo's new home console, Wii, is designed to offer fun without fuss. Its unique motion-sensitive controllers - the Wii Remote and Nunchuk - make gaming easier and more in-depth than ever. Plus, with its range of built-in Channels, Wii is much more than a games machine; offering internet access, photo editing, news updates and even a family message board system. Wii will move you like never before!
